member.name: T:DocsTestApp.Test.Reflection.ExtensionMethods
member.remarks: These methods lack actual implementation, and have been added purely in order to have something to write XML documentation against.

member.name: M:DocsTestApp.Test.Reflection.ExtensionMethods.LoadEmbeddedXmlDocs(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Loads the embedded XML documentation file from the given assembly and returns it as an XML document.
member.param: The assembly to load the XML documentation from.
member.remarks: Using this method requires that the XML documentation file hsa been embedded into the assembly when it was complied.

member.name: T:DocsTestApp.Test.Reflection.Options
member.summary: Just an enumeration for testing purposes.
